reviews.review:
Новая система сброса рангов привела к тому, что маны начали жёстко кемпить и туннелить.
Раньше они тоже кемпили и туннелили, но, теперь это делается вообще внаглую (кажется, маны даже гордятся собой за это действие).
Положительных эмоций в этой игре практически нет, зато достаточно негатива (от нечестных хитов в окно\палетках, прожатого на земле ореха, и т.д.).
Нахрен такую игру, и нахрен производителя игр, принимающего такие решения.
Good game to play with friends

Игра треш по трем причинам. 1) Играть за маньяка против пати просто невозможно(а многие играют в пати более 90 процентов). 2) Очень большое количество читеров. 3) В игре есть почти бесконечные лупы на картах. Так что игра треш и разрабы дебилы. Новый патч такое же гавно. 2021 год.

This game is not perfect and have a lot of places for improvement, you could get very frustrated while playing but nonetheless it still means a lot to me and I've played it for more than 1000 hours. Playing as your favorite horror icons with their specific power are also something you can't find everywhere. I have actually went to watch the show/movie because of this game. If you have friends to play with then it would be even better. If it is on sale then I would recommend buying it even though it could get frustrating to play with from time to time. If you like to play survival horror games with the options of hiding from killer or chasing down survivors, than this game is suitable for you.

La verdad que es un juegazo, los servidores son excelentes, nunca te va a encontrar partida con más de 60 ms, las perks están super balanceadas, para nada puedo objetar sobre eso. Si querés pasar un hermoso rato jugando tenés que hacerlo de killer, porque de otro modo no se puede, es muy raro que te ganen 4 supervivientes sin matar siquiera a 1. Campear y tunelear está penalizado, lo haces y te banean, tiene una comunidad y un staff super atento (arreglan bugs en menos de 1 semana). Nunca te desconecta de una partida y está súper optimizado, no necesitas nada de esos ryzen 5 que dicen por ahí, lo podés jugar hasta con la net del gobierno
 Ah y los chungos funcionan 10/10.
 En fin, juego de mierda.
В компании можно отлично провести время с друзьями)

Trash game where survivors are benefited for playing with discord to a point where playing as killer is literally trash.  Players will just body block you at the hook and there is nothing you can do.

*Edit

As of the latest patch the game won't allow me to login.  It seems everytime they patch the game it breaks in some way.  Great job!

*Edit

Now I am able to get into the game, but we keep getting stuck on an infinite loading screen.  Too bad my BF likes this game, otherwise it would definitely be an uninstall.

*Update

Still garbage and broken.  Except now it favors the killer.  They can hit you after you vault while standing on the other side.  Pallets won't drop if you are running toward them and the killer is on the other side.  If a killer is vaulting, their collision will prevent you from running past them if it is in a narrow corridor.  Seems like every time they patch something they break 10 other things.

黎明杀机是我玩过最好玩的游戏，游戏没有任何缺点，晚上十一点维护也很正常只是我没见过世面，游戏卡顿是我电脑问题，游戏服务器如丝般顺滑，排到红段车队是为了锻炼我的技术，古书任务高效又便捷，不仅如此官方还大量更新可爱角色美丽皮肤，活动奖励丰富又不肝，是游戏之鉴，游戏界面非常整洁，角色建模十分帅气可爱，美工做得也很精致，所有角色上手难度适中，游戏体验非常好。打不了双皇一段都是我手和脑子不配，联机匹配掉线是我家路由器没买对

This game is always a fun one to play, especially with some friends. Whether it be working together to get those generators fixed, get each other healed, having a good time, OR rage quitting from a character that is way too OP, regardless of what strategy. Which brings me to my statement for the day on the new Hellraiser update. NERF HIM A'LIL. I realize this is his debut, but those damn chains are relentless in stopping forward progression. Not to mention that his bald ass doesn't have to step over the wall like us cause he can just teleport through it? The hell!? Yeah, I could try playing as him and just resonate in the sheer power and capability that is Hellraiser, for whatever reason, but playing almost exclusively as a survivor, this needs to be dialed back just a bit. Please. Otherwise, if you're intersted in this game, and like horror movies, and wanna see your favorite monsters come to life, by all means, go for it.
